China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 16 日星期五 07:38:22 GMT 120
India's small exporters reel as Red Sea crisis helps rivals nab businessAtul Jhunjhunwala, an exporter in the Indian eastern city of Kolkata, is tearing his hair out, having just lost another order due to the Red Sea crisis that has jacked up his shipping costs and times. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 06:35:32 GMT TU5PKCRKJJKDNJ2Z54GILSJPRA https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indias-small-exporters-reel-red-sea-crisis-helps-rivals-nab-business-2024-02-16/Manoj Kumar, Mayank Bhardwaj世界印度
China to show off homegrown airliner at Singapore air show amid supply crunchSingapore will play host to Asia's biggest air show next week for the first time since the end of COVID border restrictions, with regional travel rebounding and the military side of the show bristling with defensive systems and nervous arms buyers. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:55:19 GMT UZIVEC3ZPFNH3I2MBP3O53UMJE https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/china-show-off-homegrown-airliner-singapore-air-show-amid-supply-crunch-2024-02-16/Lisa Barrington, Tim Hepher商业航空航天与国防
Hong Kong authorities arrest seven in $1.8 bln money laundering caseHong Kong authorities said on Friday they had arrested seven people suspected of being involved in a $1.8 billion money laundering case, the largest ever in the financial hub. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:29:33 GMT FGPYJOOL5ZJTVOYA6C5TGZP3GI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hong-kong-authorities-arrest-7-18-bln-money-laundering-case-2024-02-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
Australian wine makers bet on expected China reopening with big shipments to Hong KongAustralian wine makers have shipped millions of bottles of wine to Hong Kong in a bet that China will soon lift tariffs on Australian wine and revive a trade worth hundreds of millions of dollars, according to industry figures and trade data. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:27:58 GMT WPMPLJS3LNNWPNJVH6YHVSAFHA https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/australian-winemakers-bet-expected-china-reopening-with-big-shipments-hong-kong-2024-02-16/Peter Hobson, Lewis Jackson市场亚洲市场
Nikkei within reach of all-time high, dollar finds its footingJapan's Nikkei closed at another 34-year peak on Friday, helped higher by a buoyant Wall Street, while the dollar found its footing after a big fall in U.S. retail sales revived chances of a June rate cut. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 02:12:51 GMT T54GJQ5O5ZPLRM35HHETX比吉https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-02-16/Stella Qiu市场
Dollar firms as traders weigh economic data, yen fragileThe dollar firmed on Friday, on track for its fifth straight weekly gain, as investors assessed the latest economic data and firm expectations of the Federal Reserve cutting rates in June, while the yen was anchored around the key 150 per dollar level. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 01:33:45 GMT HPH5C6ZHFVM2LH6KSAXMF7IYVQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-steady-traders-weigh-economic-data-yen-fragile-2024-02-16/Ankur Banerjee市场货币
